casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Robert Hugh HEWSON. No. 188P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Rudolph A. Ashton, III, Charles K. McCotter, Jr., New Bern, for Hewson. Alexander McC. Peters, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 642 S.E.2d 459 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 19th day of April 2007 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd day of August 2007."
